hero_subtitle: Find your first job among thousands of vacancies developed specifically for students. Gain experience and skills that will help you become a sought-after specialist.
develop_skills_description: Find an internship or job that will help you develop your professional skills and gain practical experience.
professions_future_description: Discover job opportunities in fields that will be relevant and in demand in the future.
flexible_schedule_description: Look for jobs with flexible schedules that allow you to balance your studies and work responsibilities.
career_growth_support_description: Receive advice and recommendations on career growth and successful job placement from professionals.
internships_practice_description: Find internships and practices that will help you at the start of your career and provide valuable experience.
work_favorite_field_description: Choose job openings in areas that genuinely interest you and start doing what you love now.
name: Name
please_enter_your_email_and_create_passw: Please enter your E-mail address, then create your own account password.
agree_terms: I've read and agree with all of the instructions
welcome_message_login: Welcome! We are glad that you chose us. Log in here...
student's_job_foundation_info: The Student's Job project was founded in May 2023. Initially, it began as a pet project but has since undergone significant changes. We have made major updates to both the design and functionality of the website.
second_main_heading: Facts about our company that you should know
second_main_description: Join our community and offer people your vacancies
fact_love: Our platform has a very large number of vacancies related to working on a computer, which every modern teenager can do.
fact_company: On our platform, you can easily upload and manage resumes and cover letters to quickly apply to jobs and get feedback from employers.
fact_user: Thanks to a user-friendly interface and an advanced filter system, you can find a suitable vacancy in just a couple of clicks by selecting a job based on your interests, schedule and experience level.
